title: Doris Lessing - Novels, Short Stories, Memoirs (31 books)
description:
DORIS LESSING (1919Ã‚Â - 2013) was a British novelist, poet, playwright, librettist, biographer and short story writer.  When she was awarded the 2007 Nobel Prize in Literature, the Swedish Academy described her as "that epicist of the female experience, who with scepticism, fire and visionary power has subjected a divided civilisation to scrutiny."  She died earlier today.


The books in this collection are of varying quality.  With the four exceptions noted below, they are all in EPUB/MOBI format:

* ADORE: A Novella (2004)

* AFRICAN LAUGHTER (1992)

* AN OLD WOMAN AND HER CAT (1972)

* BEN, IN THE WORLD (2000)

* BRIEFING FOR A DESCENT INTO HELL (1971)

* CANOPUS IN ARGOS, VOL. 1: Shikasta (1979)

* CANOPUS IN ARGOS, VOL. 3: The Sirian Experiments (1980)

* CANOPUS IN ARGOS, VOL. 4: The Making of the Representative for Planet 8 (1982)

* THE CHILDREN OF VIOLENCE, Vol. 1: Martha Quest (1952)

* THE CHILDREN OF VIOLENCE, Vol. 2: A Proper Marriage (1954)

* THE CHILDREN OF VIOLENCE, Vol. 3: A Ripple from the Storm (1958)

* THE CHILDREN OF VIOLENCE, Vol. 4: Landlocked (1965)

* THE CHILDREN OF VIOLENCE, Vol. 5: The Four-Gated City (1969)

* THE CLEFT (2007) -- PDF

* THE FIFTH CHILD (1988)

* GOING HOME (1957)

* THE GOLDEN NOTEBOOK (1962)

* THE GOOD TERRORIST (1985)

* THE GRANDMOTHERS (2003)

* THE GRASS IS SINGING (1950)

* IN PURSUIT OF THE ENGLISH (1960)

* LOVE, AGAIN (1996)

* MARA AND DANN (1999)

* THE MEMOIRS OF A SURVIVOR (1974)

* ON CATS (2002) -- PDF

* STORIES (1980)

* THE STORY OF GENERAL DANN AND MARA'S DAUGHTER (2005)

* THE SUMMER BEFORE THE DARK (1973)

* THE SWEETEST DREAM (2001)

* UNDER MY SKIN: Volume One of My Autobiography, to 1949 (1994) -- PDF

* WALKING IN THE SHADE: Volume Two of My Autobiography, 1949 to 1962 (1997) -- PDF
